## Dt_action02: Action Information in 2016-02
```{r }
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

dt_action02 <- fread("/Users/zhangpurple/Documents/aguacha/JData/Data/JData_Action_201602.csv")
head(dt_action02)

#unique(dt_action02$model_id)
#summary(dt_action02)

qplot(model_id, data = dt_action02, geom = "bar")
#hist(dt_action02$model_id)
qplot(type, data = dt_action02, geom = "bar")
#hist(dt_action02$type)
qplot(cate, data = dt_action02, geom = "bar")
#hist(dt_action02$cate)
```

## Dt_Comment : User Comment 

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
dt_comment <- fread("/Users/zhangpurple/Documents/aguacha/JData/Data/JData_Comment.csv")
head(dt_comment)

qplot(comment_num, data = dt_comment, geom = "bar", colour = factor(comment_num))
qplot(has_bad_comment, data = dt_comment, geom = "bar", colour = factor(comment_num))
qplot(bad_comment_rate, data = dt_comment, geom = "line")
```

## Dt_Users : User Information 

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
dt_user <- fread("/Users/zhangpurple/Documents/aguacha/JData/Data/JData_User.csv")
head(dt_user)
dt_user2 <- dt_user[, user_reg_dt := as.factor(user_reg_dt)]
qplot(sex, data = dt_user2, geom = "bar", colour = factor(sex))
dt_user3 <- dt_user[order(as.Date(dt_user$user_reg_dt, format="%Y/%m/%d"))]
qplot(user_reg_dt, data = dt_user3, geom = "bar")
qplot(user_lv_cd, data = dt_user2, geom = "bar")
```
